title: Nursing Education Design Project Utilizing Generative AI (ChatGPT)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing knowledge and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Enhancing competency in designing personalized nursing education using generative AI for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more interactive educational materials based on nursing scenarios using ChatGPT
Learners can improve nursing education content at least twice by incorporating generative AI feedback
Learners can enhance educational effectiveness by 15% or more by combining peer assessment with AI analysis in a PBL approach
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
